Welcome to over-engineered simplicity. Here's what makes this *totally necessary* setup work:

The Anatomy of Modern Excess:

  • min-vh-100: Because apparently full height needs a utility class now
  • d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center: Five classes to replace what used to be two lines of CSS
  • container: Adds margins, because raw elements are *so* 1999
  • display-1: Makes headings gigantic, because subtlety is dead
  • text-muted: Gray text, because accessibility is apparently optional

Deployed via Vercel, because apparently GitHub Pages wasn't complicated enough.
No frameworks were harmed in the making of this page (yet).
